document_data.mainbody:
The Old Kings Favorite was a resplendent and glittering lounge that stood on the grand Promenade of the Cormyrean capital city of Suzail in 15 century DR.
The club stood on the Promenade, just west of Castle Obarskyr. The Court Close hooked around the Old Kings Favorites city block, starting to the west and crossing the Promenade to the east.
The Old Kings Favorite was exuberantly expensive even for the nobility of Suzail. It was renowned for being the most magnificent establishment on the Promenade. The price of the lounge meant statusâ€“the place to be seen at. The Favorite also offered exquisite food and only the best wines.
As of the late 15 century DR, Marlin Stormserpent, a scion of the Stormserpent family, considered Old Kings Favorite one of his favorite places in the city for socializing and finest dining. Lord Stormserpent tried to partake in highsunfeast at the Old Kings Favorite on the daily.
